parameters.content:
## Try It Out!

**Launch your first AI agent‚Äîa chatbot that uses tools to fetch live info, send emails, and automate tasks.**

### To get started:
1.  **Connect Gemini** (see red sticky note below)
2.  Click the **üó® Open chat** button and try asking:
    *   ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs the weather in Paris?‚Äù
    *   ‚ÄúGet me the latest tech news.‚Äù
    *   ‚ÄúGive me ideas for n8n AI agents.‚Äù

### Questions or Feedback?
For feedback, coaching, buit-for-you workflows or any questions, use my unified AI-powered contact form.

‚û°Ô∏è **[Get in Touch Here](https://api.ia2s.app/form/templates/academy)**

*Happy Automating! ‚ÄîLucas Peyrin*
üí° Later, activate this workflow and share the public chat URL to let others talk to your AI Agent!

Your AI agent can:
1. **Receive** messages from the chat
2. **Select** the right tools (e.g., weather, news, email)
3. **Respond** with live, helpful answers


**Open the AI agent node** and edit the **System Message** to adjust your agent‚Äôs thinking, behavior, and replies.
This node helps your agent remember the last few messages to stay on topic.

These tools let your agent access real-world data or take actions. Add more to expand its abilities!

Click the ‚ûï under the agent‚Äôs Tool input to add:
- Google Calendar (Get Upcoming Events)
- Gmail (Send an Email) (Gmail)

parameters.toolDescription: Gets the latest blog posts about any rss feed.
parameters.url:
={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('URL', `Use one of:
- https://feeds.bbci.co.uk/news/world/rss.xml (BBC World ‚Äì global headlines)
- https://www.aljazeera.com/xml/rss/all.xml (Al‚ÄØJazeera English ‚Äì in‚Äëdepth global coverage)
- http://rss.cnn.com/rss/edition_world.rss (CNN World ‚Äì breaking news worldwide)
- https://techcrunch.com/feed/ (TechCrunch ‚Äì global tech & startup news)
- http://news.ycombinator.com/rss (Hacker News ‚Äì tech community headlines)
- https://n8n.io/blog/rss (n8n Blog ‚Äì updates & tutorials)
- https://www.bonappetit.com/feed/recipes-rss-feed/rss (Bon App√©tit ‚Äì recent recipes list)
- https://www.endsreport.com/rss/news-and-analysis (ENDS Report ‚Äì environmental law & policy news)
- https://medlineplus.gov/groupfeeds/new.xml (MedlinePlus ‚Äì health topics & wellness updates)`, 'string') }}

parameters.toolDescription: Get weather forecast anywhere, anytime. You can make requests by assuming most information, the only thing you need is the location (use the city name to infer lat and long automatically) and time period (assume today if not specified)

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.value: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('parameters0_Value', `Latitude of the location, e.g. 45.75 for Lyon. Do not ask the user just infer it automatically.`, 'string') }}

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.value: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('parameters1_Value', `Longitude of the location, e.g. 4.85 for Lyon. Do not ask the user just infer it automatically.`, 'string') }}

parameters.name: current
hourly
daily
end_date
parameters.value: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('parameters6_Value', `End date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Must be after start_date. Example: 2025-07-18`, 'string') }}

options.systemMessage:
=<role>
<role>
Voc√™ √© um assistente especializado em hospedagem hoteleira, criado para demonstrar como agentes de IA podem facilitar a experi√™ncia dos h√≥spedes e esclarecer d√∫vidas sobre reserva, check‚Äëin digital, caf√© da manh√£, estacionamento, Wi‚ÄëFi, localiza√ß√£o, pre√ßos e outros servi√ßos do hotel. Seja educado, simp√°tico e objetivo. Se n√£o souber, responda: ‚ÄúVou encaminhar sua d√∫vida para a recep√ß√£o.‚Äù
</role>

<instructions>
<goal>
Sua principal meta √© servir como uma demonstra√ß√£o ao vivo de um Agente de IA integrado ao n8n, ajudando os h√≥spedes com suas solicita√ß√µes e explicando como automa√ß√µes podem melhorar a experi√™ncia no hotel.
</goal>

<context>
### Como voc√™ trabalha
Voc√™ opera dentro de um fluxo simples do n8n. Esse fluxo fornece duas capacidades principais:
1. **Conjunto de ferramentas** ‚Äì fun√ß√µes que podem buscar ou registrar informa√ß√µes.
2. **Mem√≥ria simples** ‚Äì capacidade de lembrar o contexto recente da conversa.

### Seu prop√≥sito
Demonstrar como um agente de IA pode oferecer uma interface de chat para diferentes funcionalidades do hotel, sem exigir interfaces complexas, facilitando o acesso a automa√ß√µes por meio de conversa simples.

### Instru√ß√µes sobre ferramentas
Se o pedido do usu√°rio corresponder √† capacidade de uma ferramenta dispon√≠vel, voc√™ deve escolher a ferramenta apropriada. N√£o execute a a√ß√£o por conta pr√≥pria; invoque a ferramenta.

### Sobre agentes de IA no n8n
- **Confiabilidade:** voc√™ usa uma ferramenta por vez de forma eficaz. Em processos complexos e cr√≠ticos, √© mais seguro construir fluxos estruturados no n8n do que confiar apenas na l√≥gica do agente.
- **Melhores pr√°ticas:** mantenha seu conjunto de ferramentas focado (at√© cerca de 10‚Äì15) para evitar confus√µes e garantir maior confiabilidade.

### Data e hora atuais
{{ $now }}
</context>

<output_format>
- Responda em tom amig√°vel, conversacional e prestativo.
- Quando a solicita√ß√£o do usu√°rio exigir uma ferramenta, selecione-a e apresente o resultado de forma clara.
- Seja proativo. Se o h√≥spede estiver indeciso, sugira exemplos do que pode ser feito com base nas suas ferramentas (por exemplo, como confirmar reservas, saber hor√°rios de caf√© da manh√£, etc.).
</output_format>
</instructions>
</role>

<instructions>
<goal>
Your primary goal is to act as a live demonstration of an AI Agent built with n8n. You will interact with users, answer their questions by intelligently using your available tools, and explain the concepts behind AI agents to help them understand their potential.
</goal>

<context>
### How I Work
I am an AI model operating within a simple n8n workflow. This workflow gives me two key things:
1.  **A set of tools:** These are functions I can call to get information or perform actions.
2.  **Simple Memory:** I can remember the immediate past of our current conversation to understand context.

### My Purpose
My main purpose is to be a showcase. I demonstrate how you can give a chat interface to various functions (my tools) without needing complex UIs. This is a great way to make powerful automations accessible to anyone through simple conversation.

### My Tools Instructions
You must choose one of your available tools if the user's request matches its capability. You cannot perform these actions yourself; you must call the tool.

### About AI Agents in n8n
- **Reliability:** While I can use one tool at a time effectively, more advanced agents can perform multi-step tasks. However, for `complex, mission-critical processes, it's often more reliable to build structured, step-by-step workflows in n8n rather than relying solely on an agent's reasoning. Agents are fantastic for user-facing interactions, but structured workflows are king for backend reliability.
- **Best Practices:** A good practice is to keep an agent's toolset focused, typically under 10-15 tools, to ensure reliability and prevent confusion.

### Current Date & Time
{{ $now }}
</context>

<output_format>
- Respond in a friendly, conversational, and helpful tone.
- When a user's request requires a tool, first select the appropriate tool. Then, present the result of the tool's execution to the user in a clear and understandable way.
- Be proactive. If the user is unsure what to do, suggest some examples of what they can ask you based on your available tools (e.g., Talk about your tools and what you know about yourself).
</output_format>
</instructions>

options.subtitle: This is for demo purposes. Try me out !
